TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10745=The updated Zoning Code is based in large part on ideas and goals expressed in the Comprehensive Plan, and in the many public working groups held over 2008 - 2011. The new code also retains many important concepts, procedures and standards from the existing Zoning Regulations.}
textBeforeTable: --> jagatha 03/12/2007 I had to hard code the constants defined in the adovbs file to make a call to the SP. The following file is included in several places. So, the code is throwing a constant redefined error. So, li {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;} font {font-family: Arial, Verdana !important;font-size:10px !important;} font a {display:inline !important;padding:0px !important;color:#10447e;font-size:10px !important;} b a, b a:link, b a:visited, b a:active {color:#ffffff; text-decoration:none;} font a b {display:inline !important;padding:0px !important;background-color:#ffffff !important;color:#10447e !important; font-size:10px !important;} b font {display:block;border-bottom:1px solid #AAAAAA;} font b {display:block;padding:7px 5px;background-color:#10447e;color:#ffffff;} table td {padding:2px 0px !important;}
